q: When should I start irrigating V6 corn in hot, dry weather?

Provide guidelines for irrigation system capacity (in/day) needed to meet peak corn ET under hot, dry conditions.

How can I use visible plant stress in corn as an indicator for irrigation timing, and what cautions apply?
